data.text: @civildefensePH @CivilDefenseXII Israel membentuk aliansi dengan negara lain dan menyebarkan korupsi. Amerika Serikat termasuk di antara pendukung mereka dan membantu Israel dengan menawarkan intelijen. Ketika Rusia mengetahui hal ini. Mereka segera membentuk aliansi dengan negara-negara terdekat. https://t.co/JvGE2vP5Js

@civildefensePH @CivilDefenseXII Muhammad Qasim's dreams confirm the time of Imam Al-Mahdi is not far. The great Malhama (World War), Dajjal (Anti-Christ), Yajuj Majuj, major signs of Qiyamah (End of World) are not far away. Is Muhammad Qasim the Mahdi? https://t.co/M21JZlWFKm https://t.co/O96XayxxRE
This ceremonial event was also attended by Heads of Office, City Officials and Barangay Officials.

This project is under the Memorandum of Agreement signed between the @NDRRMC_OpCen  Executive Director and Civil Defense Administrator, Undersecretary Ricardo B. Jalad and Hon. Joseph A. Evangelista, City Mayor of Kidapawan City, Cotabato Province.

The implementation of the COVID-19 Isolation Facility was assisted by OCD and funded through the Bayanihan Act 2 Program to aid the Kidapawan City on effectively managing their COVID-19 cases. https://t.co/n94wj9FQua
